subject: Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Kentucky Coach John Calipari signed a center  and received a commitment from a guard, two players Calipari hopes can fill the holes left by players  who went to the N.B.A.
snippet: Kentucky Coach John Calipari signed a center  and received a commitment from a guard, two players Calipari hopes can fill the holes left by players  who went to the N.B.A.
